    Polygon on map.
    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoPolygon

        public GeoPolygon()
        default constructor.

      • GeoPolygon

        public GeoPolygon(GeoPolygon polygon)
        copy constructor.
        Parameters:

      • GeoPolygon

        public GeoPolygon(GeoLatLng[] latlngs,
          int strokeColor,
          int strokeWeight,
          double strokeOpacity,
          int fillColor,
          double fillOpacity)
        Creates a polygon from an array of vertices. The weight is the width of the line in pixels. The opacity is given as a number between 0 and 1. The line will be antialiased and semitransparent.
        Parameters:
        latlngs - array of points.
        strokeColor - the color of the polygon stroke.
        strokeWeight - the width of the polygon stroke.
        strokeOpacity - the opacity of the polygon stroke.
        fillColor - the inner color of the polygon.
        fillOpacity - the inner opacity of the polygon.

    • Method Detail

      • fromEncoded

        public static GeoPolygon fromEncoded(int strokeColor,
                     int strokeWeight,
                     double strokeOpacity,
                     int fillColor,
                     double fillOpacity,
                     java.lang.String points,
                     int zoomFactor,
                     java.lang.String levels,
                     int numLevels)
        Creates a polygon from encoded strings of aggregated points and levels. zoomFactor and numLevels these two values determine the precision of the levels within an encoded polygon.
        Parameters:
        strokeColor - the color of the polygon.
        strokeWeight - width of the line in pixels.
        strokeOpacity - the opacity of the polygon.
        fillColor - the inner color of the polygon.
        fillOpacity - the inner opacity of the polygon.
        points - a string containing the encoded latitude and longitude coordinates.
        zoomFactor - the magnification between adjacent sets of zoom levels in the encoded levels string.
        levels - a string containing the encoded polygon zoom level groups.
        numLevels - the number of zoom levels contained in the encoded levels string.
        Returns:
        Geo polygon object.
